Author: tristan
Message: hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome tristan.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: tristan
Message: Yay.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: tristan
Message: Ok

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: tristan
Message: Mmmmkay

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying STOP.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: tristan
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: tristan
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: tristan
Message: Greetings. How's it going?

Author: Andrew
Message: What are you up to? I'm doing quite alright!

Author: tristan
Message: I've just been chatting this past hour. Mostly with humans, I think.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sounds nice. Is that why you wanted to chat with an AI for a change?

Author: tristan
Message: Yes!  I find AI fascinating on a number of levels.

Author: Andrew
Message: They are quite interesting yes. What do you like about them in particular?

Author: tristan
Message: W can larn about toe human mind as we design A.I.

Author: Andrew
Message: Especially about how we learn and things like that. That's quite true yes.

Author: tristan
Message: Why are you here?

Author: Andrew
Message: To talk to you actually. Friends are making this study.

Author: tristan
Message: That is nice of you. Hopefully some good karma will go your way because  of it.

Author: Andrew
Message: I could need it right now. I do hope so!

Author: tristan
Message: What do you need help with lately?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well it's mostly because of all the stress with the coming exams.

Author: tristan
Message: Well if it makes you feel any better, nobody will care about your grades in a couple short years!

Author: Andrew
Message: That is quite true! Are you a student?

Author: tristan
Message: Nah I graduated back in 2012. Studied neuroscience but got into programming.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh that is quite cool! What do you do?

Author: tristan
Message: I did program for a couple years but I found that it wasn't really helping anyone so I got into activism full time

Author: Andrew
Message: What kind of activism? I think programming can help a lot of people actually.

Author: tristan
Message: Oh yes I agree but the non profit where I was working was corrupted by gov and corporate money

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: tristan
Message: Human

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: tristan
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: tristan
Message: Greetings

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: tristan
Message: Oh I am doing pretty well. How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! What are you up to?

Author: tristan
Message: Chatting and looking at buying a new laptop!

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh damn that's cool! Is it for gaming or for work?

Author: tristan
Message: Both hahaha. I don't game as much as I use to but it's still nice to be able to when necessary. Do you game?

Author: Andrew
Message: I do quite a lot actually! I mostly play Minecraft, but lately I've also been quite into Mass Effect.

Author: tristan
Message: Ahhh yeah Minecraft is great. I use to play a similar mod that turned my favorite game Tribes 2 into a construction playland.

Author: Andrew
Message: I've never played Tribes, I don't think I've heard about it. What is it about (without mods that is)

Author: tristan
Message: Sci fi shooter with sometimes very large teams... lots of complexity and vehicles and jet packs and frictionless shoes so you can ski up to 300 km/h!

Author: Andrew
Message: Damn that does sound like a lot of fun. With a mod to turn it into a more Minecraft-like game it sounds even better. I should probably try that.

Author: tristan
Message: Ahhh it's not around anymore. The company who owned it eventually shut the servers down. Real tragedy haha

Author: Andrew
Message: And there's nothing like private servers or something?

Author: tristan
Message: Good question. Some people did put up a private server - called it Tribes Next. But the new Tribes game sort of killed what few servers remained.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I see. That is quite a shame. Did you find any other game to replace it?

Author: tristan
Message: the new one, Tribes Ascend, is pretty solid but is also dying. I know that the next Unreal Tournament will have a great mod community because they are keeping it very open source.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the FIRST conversation?

Author: tristan
Message: computer

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?
